data.name: The Cloud Dream of the Nine - A new beginning of a dream
data.detailed_description:
This is the spin-off story of the main episode of The Cloud Dream of the Nine where you can target three characters in it.
A new story unfolds which is similar yet different from the main story.

★ New Story
  • The newly added spin-off story
  • Daily life story of the female character and the three male characters
  • The voices of male characters, CG, and OST added according to the story

  • ★ Special clear reward
  • Theme video and side story as rewards when you clear the character under certain conditions

[Guide]

This is a DLC that can be purchased while possessing the main game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
